sail_lookup_table_wind_angles.description: Wind angles for the lookup table in degrees.

sail_lookup_table_sail_positions.description: Sail positions corresponding to the wind angles in the lookup table.

no_sail_zone_size.description: Size of the no-sail zone in degrees.

min_sail_angle.description: Minimum angle to sail before changing tacks, in degrees.

max_sail_angle.description: Maximum angle to sail before changing tacks, in degrees.

autopilot_refresh_rate.description: Refresh rate for the autopilot in seconds.

waypoint_accuracy.description: The accuracy required to consider a waypoint reached, in meters.

perform_forced_jibe_instead_of_tack.description: If true, perform a forced jibe instead of a tack when the wind angle is too high.

tack_distance.description: Rough distance to sail before changing tacks based on dynamic tacking system. Ask Chris for more info.

jibe_tolerance.description: How close to jibe angle to stop steering around and start sailing along the jibe line.

tack_tolerance.description: How close to tacking angle to stop steering around and start sailing along the tack line.

min_rudder_angle.description: Minimum angle for the rudder, in degrees.

max_rudder_angle.description: Maximum angle for the rudder, in degrees.

rudder_p_gain.description: Proportional gain for the rudder control.

rudder_i_gain.description: Integral gain for the rudder control.

rudder_d_gain.description: Derivative gain for the rudder control.

rudder_n_gain.description: N gain for the rudder control.

rudder_hard_over.description: Hard over value for the rudder control, in radians.
